titleStmt.title: The petition of Sir Philomy Oneale Knight, generall of the rebels in Jreland, and of the lords, nobility and commanders of the army of the Catholiques in that kingdome. Presented to the Right Honourable, the Lords and Commons now assembled in the High Court of Parliament in England.
titleStmt.author: O'Neill, Phelim, Sir, 1604?-1653.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.F. for John Thomas,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
